newsitem.title: USA: Australian Premier Howard to visit Washington.
newsitem.headline: Australian Premier Howard to visit Washington.

text.p: Australian Prime Minister John Howard will visit the United States from June 25 to July 1 and meet President Bill Clinton at the White House, Clinton's spokesman said on Friday.
Spokesman Mike McCurry told reporters Howard would meet Clinton on June 27 for an official working visit.

He said apart from substantive discussions, Clinton looked forward to repaying "some of the fine hospitality and the warm welcome he got from the Australian people" when he travelled to Australia last November.
